name: Root Wars
description:
Root Wars - GGJ 2023

You are one of the creature living in the cave under the root of Holy Tree. Defeat all the competitors to become The King of Root Wars!!! 

How to play:

Player 1:

Move: WASD

Attack: E

Skill: Q (Holy Root required)

Player 2:

Move: TFGH

Attack: Y

Skill: R (Holy Root required)

Player 3:

Move: IJKL

Attack: O

Skill: U (Holy Root required)

Player 4:

Move: Arrow

Attack: /

Skill: . (Holy Root required)
